name: House Check
description:
CONTENT WARNING!

This visual novel contains questionable themes such as stalking and unhealthy obsession!

The warnings will be updated upon the full game's release.

=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=

Arlon and Owen are friends.

Arlon loves Owen.

Arlon makes sure Owen's comfort zone is always safe.

Which is why,

Arlon always makes sure he is updated on everything Owen does.

Including in his home.

=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=

This Visual Novel is in development!

The planned full game has:

- 7 endings

- Side Stories of the characters

- A Better GUI than the default one

=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=

CREDITS

Background Images are stock images from Pexels

Background Music from Maou Damashii

Sound Effects from freesound.org

Characters, Story & Art by Me
